item.title: CS50x - Week 0 Review
item.description: As I am still taking my first formative steps in my IT career, I find myself constantly curious on everything there is out there to learn. Consistently, there seems to be a single skill that is universally valued for it’s meaningful utility â€” programming. I found the CS50x course while looking for a course that would provide an effective foundation, and since there seems to be a universal agreement on the quality of this course, I figured it perfectly suitable.
